Everything is accelerating, we know it, and best thing is?.

It's constant!

There are many theories around about the: why?, how? and who?; of this acceleration.

Here we use Linear regression with Python to analize and visualize data of all nobel prizes awarded from 1901 to the present. 

100 years of the best human effort to explain the why, how, and who.

One pattern is observable:

    The more we study the brain:
